content: You have been granted access to the {{itemName}} document. Click the link below to open the document right now: {{shareLink}}.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a notification email body when sharing a document externally. It will be inserted into an email template and includes a link to open the shared document.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English version uses 'Click the link below' while the Azerbaijani uses 'aşağıdakı linki klikləyin'. While not incorrect, 'klikləyin' is a loanword. A more natural Azerbaijani phrasing could be used.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sənədi hazırda açmaq üçün aşağıdakı keçidi klikləyin/və ya tıklayın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'You have been granted access' is not perfectly conveyed by 'Даден Ви е достъп'. While understandable, a more accurate and natural translation would be 'Имате достъп'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Имате достъп до документ {{itemName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Bulgarian translation doesn't include a period at the end of the first sentence, which is standard in Bulgarian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Имате достъп до документ {{itemName}}. Кликнете върху връзката долу, за да отворите документа сега: {{shareLink}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is slightly awkward. 'Kliknutím na níže uvedený odkaz dokument právě teď otevřete' translates literally to 'By clicking on the link below, document open right now'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Byl vám udělen přístup k dokumentu {{itemName}}. Kliknutím na níže uvedený odkaz jej nyní otevřete: {{shareLink}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'otevřete' (you open) is in the imperative form. The English uses the conditional 'to open'. The imperative feels slightly forceful.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Byl vám udělen přístup k dokumentu {{itemName}}. Kliknutím na níže uvedený odkaz jej můžete nyní otevřete: {{shareLink}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "You have been granted access" is better translated as something more formal in German, suitable for a business context. "Ihnen wurde Zugriff erteilt" is acceptable, but slightly less formal than might be desired.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ihnen wurde Zugriff auf das Dokument {{itemName}} gewährt.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English uses a colon to introduce the share link, while the German uses a period. While a period isn't necessarily incorrect, maintaining consistency with the English phrasing would improve readability and user experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ihnen wurde Zugriff auf das Dokument {{itemName}} erteilt. Zum Öffnen klicken Sie auf den Link:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'granted access' is better translated as 'accorder l'accès' or 'donner l'accès' rather than just 'autorisé à accéder'. While 'autorisé à accéder' isn't strictly incorrect, it's less natural in French.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vous avez reçu l'accès au document {{itemName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon (:) after 'maintenant' is stylistically less common in French. It's more natural to omit it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cliquez sur le lien ci-dessous pour ouvrir le document maintenant {{shareLink}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "տրվել է մատչում դեպի" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "granted access to." It's a bit clunky and doesn't quite convey the intended meaning. A more fluent translation would be something like "ձեզ մատչվել է ցանկություն դեպի" or a more direct equivalent, possibly rephrased.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives such as "Ձեզ ցանկություն է տրվել դեպի" or "Ձեզ ունեցել եք մատչություն դեպի" depending on the desired tone.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the placeholders {{itemName}} and {{shareLink}} are present, the sentence flow around them could be improved. The current phrasing feels slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Re-evaluate the sentence structure to integrate the placeholders more naturally. For example, "Ձեզ տրվել է մատչություն դեպի {{itemName}} փաստաթուղթը, և ահա այստեղ էլ կանգնած է այն հղումը, որով կարող եք այն հենց հիմա բացել՝ {{shareLink}}."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Fare clic sul collegamento sottostante" is slightly awkward. A more natural Italian phrasing would be "Clicca sul link sottostante" or "Fai clic sul link sottostante".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Clicca sul link sottostante

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '{{shareLink}}をクリックしてください' is slightly awkward. It's repetitive and not the most natural phrasing in Japanese. Repeating the action is less common in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: {{shareLink}} をクリックしてドキュメントを開いてください。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "여세요" is not the correct verb for "open" in this context. "여세요" means something closer to 'take' or 'receive'. The correct verb for opening a document would be "열어보세요".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: {{itemName}} 문서에 대한 액세스 권한을 부여 받았습니다. 아래 링크를 클릭하여 지금 바로 문서를 열어보세요: {{shareLink}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'document' is translated as 'ເອກະສານ' which is correct, but the repetition can be slightly improved for a more natural flow. While technically correct, it might sound a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to avoid repeating 'ເອກະສານ' immediately. For example: 'ທ່ານໄດ້ຮັບອະນຸຍາດເຂົ້າເຖິງເອກະສານ {{itemName}}. ກົດທີ່ລິ້ງດ້ານລຸ່ມເພື່ອເປີດມັນດຽວນີ້: {{shareLink}}.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ດຽວນີ້' (right now) could be positioned for slightly better flow. While not strictly incorrect, placing it later might sound more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider repositioning 'ດຽວນີ້' to the end of the sentence: 'ທ່ານໄດ້ຮັບອະນຸຍາດເຂົ້າເຖິງເອກະສານ {{itemName}}. ກົດທີ່ລິ້ງດ້ານລຸ່ມເພື່ອເປີດເອກະສານນີ້ດຽວນີ້: {{shareLink}}.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Latvian translation uses a colon after 'dokumentu' when introducing the share link. In Latvian, this is less common and feels slightly unnatural in this context. A period ('.') is generally preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace the colon (':') after 'dokumentu' with a period ('.')

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Foi-lhe concedido acesso" is overly formal for a sharing email. A more common and natural phrasing would be "Você recebeu acesso" or "Você tem acesso".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Você recebeu acesso ao documento {{itemName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "agora mesmo" is a bit emphatic and might sound slightly awkward in this context. A simpler "agora" is generally preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Clique no link abaixo para abrir o documento agora: {{shareLink}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation uses 'ca să' which can sound a bit informal in this context. A more formal option would improve the tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: V-a fost acordat accesul la document {{itemName}}. Faceți clic pe link-ul de mai jos pentru a deschide documentul chiar acum: {{shareLink}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "granted access" is not accurately translated. 'ඔබට ප්‍රවේශය ලබා දී ඇත' literally translates to 'You have been given access.' While understandable, a more natural translation might be 'ඔබට accès ලැබ ඇත' (You have received access) or 'ඔබට mengakses වීමට අවසර දී ඇත' (You have been permitted to access).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'ඔබට accès ලැබ ඇත' or 'ඔබට mengakses වීමට අවසර දී ඇත'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'පහත සබැඳිය ඔබන්න' (Click the link below) could be improved for a more natural flow. A less literal translation might be more suitable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'පහත සබැඳිය ක්ලික් කරන්න' or 'පහත සබැඳිය ක්ලික් කිරීමෙන් ලේඛනය ඇරීමට'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation uses 'Kliknutím na odkaz nižšie otvoríte dokument hneď teraz:' which is a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would be 'Kliknite na odkaz nižšie, aby ste dokument otvorili hneď teraz.' or 'Otvoríte dokument hneď teraz kliknutím na odkaz nižšie.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kliknite na odkaz nižšie, aby ste dokument otvorili hneď teraz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "You have been granted access" is not accurately translated. "Omogočen vam je dostop" is a literal translation that doesn't convey the intended meaning of being *given* access.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Imeli boste dostop do...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Click the link below' is a bit stiff.  A more natural Slovenian phrasing could improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kliknite na povezavo, da odprete dokument.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'granted' is not accurately translated. 'Добили сте приступ' (dobili ste pristup) translates to 'You have access,' which doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'granted access'. A more appropriate translation might be 'Имате дозволу за приступ' (imate dozvolu za pristup) or 'Добили сте право приступа' (dobili ste pravo pristupa).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Имате дозволу за приступ документу {{itemName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon after 'document' seems unnecessary and disrupts the flow of the Serbian sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Добили сте приступ документу {{itemName}}. Кликните на линк испод да отворите {{shareLink}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation lacks the punctuation mark (period) at the end of the first sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dobili ste pristup dokumentu {{itemName}}. Kliknite na link ispod da otvorite dokument odmah: {{shareLink}}.
